data.lyric:
[ti:Off My Face]
[ar:Justin Bieber]
[al:Justice (中国特别版)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Off My Face - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)
[00:03.64]Lyrics by：Jake Torrey/Daniel James/Justin Bieber/Tia Scola/Leah Haywood
[00:07.29]Composed by：Jake Torrey/Daniel James/Justin Bieber/Tia Scola/Leah Haywood
[00:10.94]One touch and you got me stoned
[00:13.59]Higher than I've ever known
[00:16.13]You call the shots and I follow
[00:20.13]
[00:21.40]Sunrise but the night still young
[00:24.02]No words but we speak in tongues
[00:26.47]If you let me I might say too much
[00:30.59]
[00:31.80]Your touch blurred my vision
[00:34.24]It's your world and I'm just in it
[00:36.74]Even sober I'm not thinkin' straight
[00:40.45]
[00:41.28]'Cause I'm off my face in love with you
[00:46.45]I'm out my head so into you and I don't know how you do it
[00:54.77]But I'm forever ruined by you ooh ooh ooh
[01:01.39]
[01:03.09]Can't sleep 'cause I'm way too buzzed
[01:05.72]Too late now you're in my blood
[01:08.23]I don't hate the way you keep me up
[01:12.49]
[01:13.55]Your touch blurred my vision
[01:16.06]It's your world and I'm just in it
[01:18.45]Even sober I'm not thinkin' straight
[01:23.01]'Cause I'm off my face in love with you
[01:28.20]I'm out my head so into you and I don't know how you do it
[01:36.52]But I'm forever ruined by you ooh ooh ooh
[01:43.13]
[01:44.39]Ooh-ooh-ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[01:52.34]Ooh-ooh-ooh ooh ooh
[01:54.95]Ooh-ooh-ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[02:02.70]Ooh-ooh-ooh ooh ooh
[02:04.75]'Cause I'm off my face in love with you
[02:09.87]I'm out my head so into you and I don't know how you do it
[02:18.23]But I'm forever ruined by you ooh ooh ooh
[02:25.06]
[02:25.62]By you ooh ooh ooh
data.trans:
[ti:Off My Face]
[ar:Justin Bieber]
[al:Justice (中国特别版)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.64]//
[00:07.29]//
[00:10.94]你轻轻一碰 我就为你沉醉
[00:13.59]这种幸福前所未有
[00:16.13]一切由你决定 我会紧紧跟随
[00:20.13]
[00:21.40]朝阳升起 但夜晚依然美丽
[00:24.02]无需言语 我们心有灵犀
[00:26.47]若你让我开口 我或许会说太多
[00:30.59]
[00:31.80]你的指尖模糊我的视线
[00:34.24]我沉浸在你的世界里
[00:36.74]即使清醒时 我也思绪混乱
[00:40.45]
[00:41.28]因为我已深深爱上你
[00:46.45]我失去了理智 好喜欢你 不知你怎有如此魔力
[00:54.77]我的防线已被你彻底击溃
[01:01.39]
[01:03.09]无法入眠 因为我太过陶醉
[01:05.72]为时已晚 我已无法将你释怀
[01:08.23]你让我夜不能寐 我并不觉得难受
[01:12.49]
[01:13.55]你的指尖模糊我的视线
[01:16.06]我沉浸在你的世界里
[01:18.45]即使清醒时 我也思绪混乱
[01:23.01]因为我已深深爱上你
[01:28.20]我失去了理智 好喜欢你 不知你怎有如此魔力
[01:36.52]我的防线已被你彻底击溃
[01:43.13]
[01:44.39]//
[01:52.34]//
[01:54.95]//
[02:02.70]//
[02:04.75]因为我已深深爱上你
[02:09.87]我失去了理智 好喜欢你 不知你怎有如此魔力
[02:18.23]我的防线已被你彻底击溃
[02:25.06]
[02:25.62]被你俘获
